# rtx_interfaces (Data Source)

Use this data source to get network interface information from an RTX router.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal identifier for this data source.
- `interfaces` (List of Object) List of network interfaces on the RTX router. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))

<a id="nestedatt--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `admin_up` (Boolean)
- `attributes` (Map of String)
- `description` (String)
- `ipv4` (String)
- `ipv6` (String)
- `kind` (String)
- `link_up` (Boolean)
- `mac` (String)
- `mtu` (Number)
- `name` (String)
